<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Almiraj](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2473)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=20" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace](/Sources.aspx?ID=45) pg. 16</row>

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10); (can't speak any language)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** -3

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +3
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +5 

–2 status penalty vs. [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120) spells
</row>

**HP** 20

**Magic Susceptibility** An almiraj takes a –2 status penalty to saving throws against [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120) spells. Any beneficial occult spells with a duration of 1 round or longer cast on the almiraj last twice as long.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, burrow 10 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
horn +9 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 piercing

**Magic Horn**   Any living creature slain by the almiraj's horn Strike immediately becomes [petrified](/Conditions.aspx?ID=30) with no saving throw, in addition to dying. A severed almiraj horn retains a wisp of its former magic; in combat, the horn can be wielded as a _+1 [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_ or, if affixed to a shaft, a _+1 [spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10)_.

</column>
